title: Zigzag Conversion
description:
The string 'PAYPALISHIRING' is written in a zigzag pattern on a given number of rows like this: (you may want to display this pattern in a fixed font for better legibility). P   A   H   N
A P L S I I G
Y   I   R. And then read line by line: 'PAHNAPLSIIGYIR'. Write the code that will take a string and make this conversion given a number of rows.
input_format: String s and integer numRows separated by newline.
